text: Depends if you control the module code. Most methods rely on using Javascript to inject the phone number / emails (they assume spammers don’t spin up browsers to scrape the web.) You do have to be careful not to prevent screen readers from being able to read them. So no perfect solution, just please make sure you test it out with a screen reader! :slightly_smiling_face:
Can we get the icon module field documentation updated to include/explain these params?

In-short yes.

There are some parts of this that deserve a deeper dive that we’ve got work to do to make this really easy to use.

That said what we have right now definitely can be expanded upon. Will see what quick updates and clarifications we can make.

*Niko Dixon*  [4:52 PM]
Hello everyone - not sure if this is the exact channel for my question (I also posted in the JS frameworks thread and I apologize for the repetition) but, here it goes:

Has anyone been able to find a library or means of achieving download/print as pdf functionality in HubSpot?

Would greatly appreciate any help!
